Dollar42 is a blog evangelizing simple and sensible financial and tax decision-making. It is a product of Dollar 42, LLC.

[<i class="bi bi-linkedin"></i> Andy Lindeman, EA](https://www.linkedin.com/in/andylindeman/) is the editor of the blog. Andy is licensed as an [enrolled agent](https://www.irs.gov/tax-professionals/enrolled-agents/enrolled-agent-information) by the IRS.

Andy has experience with U.S. personal income tax, stock compensation, retirement accounts, investment taxation and certain small business issues.

Dollar 42, LLC offers limited consultations for tax projections and planning. Dollar 42, LLC does *not* offer tax return preparation services or investment advice.
